comment: The token for your Discord bot
comment_2: The port to listen for the Twilio webhook on
comment_3: You need 1 of these per channel to sync, each must have either a unique SMS or Twilio number

bridges.comment: The Twilio SID and Token can be shared between multiple if you have a paid account with multiple numbers, trial accounts can only have one so each channel needs an account
bridges.comment_3: The Discord channel and webhook info
